medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Gradual onset over 1 day, alleviated by positioning, non-radiating. Increased urgency noted. No associated fevers, chills, anorexia, nausea, vomiting, or dysuria. Last ate at 11am and last bowel movement at 1pm.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Allergic dermatitis, fibroids (status post total abdominal hysterectomy and bilateral salpingo-oophorectomy), osteoporosis on risendronate weekly.
medical_history.family_history: Father with coronary artery disease; mother died of old age.
